Curator's comments: According to Griffith, quoted in Gardner 1888, p. 69, made from soft limestone. The precise findspot of the piece is not recorded, but it is noted in Griffth's notebook (Petrie Notebook 150; UCL, Petrie Museum) in an entry for 10 January 1885 as 'at Negash'.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (BA.36)
